items.name: Object_MessageArea
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_MessageArea
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_MessageArea extends gs.Object_Visual
    @objectCodecBlackList = ["parent", "layout", "message"]
    
    @toDataBundle: (object, context) ->
        return { message: gs.ObjectCodec.encode(object.message, context), layout: { dstRect: gs.Rect.fromObject(object.layout.dstRect) } }
        
    ###*
    * A game object used for message areas in a scene.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Object_MessageArea
    * @extends gs.Object_Visual
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (parent, data, type) ->
        super(data)
        
        @layout = null
        @message = null
        
        @addComponent(new gs.Component_Container())
    
   
gs.Object_MessageArea = Object_MessageArea
